title: I'm almost 24, is it ok to learn how to dance? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think I am able to do everything in life but NO DANCE. I went to dance class after my tenth. I thought I could dance at least to seem cool during parties and during weddings. But no! I couldn't  I believe dance skills comes from birth or by nurturing. It depends on what kind of childhood you have passed. If you are '0’ on dancing now,its a bad idea. But if you are really interested or passionate on this, go on brother. You can do it. You are almost of my age and I can feel you. Note: For dance, you should have tiktok wala face.
Yes, If your body is flexible so it will be very easy for you move your body like a professional dancer
